name: Grim Tales: The White Lady Collector's Edition
name_original: Grim Tales: The White Lady Collector's Edition
description:
Grim Tales: The White Lady Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It was originally released in 2017. It was published by Big Fish Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Grim Tales: The White Lady Collector's Edition on PC.
